text: Tuffé is a former commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Sarthe department in the west of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Tuffé-Val-de-la-Chéronne.Arrêté préfectoral 29 September 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Sarthe
title: Tuffé
